#Linear Model
Dependent:
Total clicks

Independent:
Number of job postings
Number of job-seekers
Indeed exposure
Internet Access

```{r}
clickModel <- lm(stateClicks ~ jobPostings + populationTotal + unemployedPop + unemploymentRate ,data= indeedState)
summary(clickModel)

```

```{r}
clickModel <- lm(stateClicks ~ jobPostings + jobsPerUnemployed + populationTotal,data= indeedState)
summary(clickModel)

```

```{r}
clickModel <- lm(stateClicks ~ jobPostings,data= indeedState)
summary(clickModel)

```
